name: Dinosaurs on Tiny Bikes - The Tale of the Time Travelling T-Rex
name_original: Dinosaurs on Tiny Bikes - The Tale of the Time Travelling T-Rex
description:
Created for the #GBJAM7 game jam using the original Game Boy screen resolution of 160px X 144px and sticking to a 4 colour pallet I have created a platformer game called...

DINOSAURS ON TINY BIKE - The Tale Of The Time Travelling T-Rex.

An evil galactic overlord has stolen your beloved babies, albeit in the form of dinosaur eggs as he was feeling peckish this morning. You need to get them back using your dino-cannon, jetpack, cunning, skills, wit and of course ya bike... good luck!
